title: The relationship between flavonols intake and stroke in the elderly: a cross-sectional study from NHANES (2007-2010 and 2017-2018).
abstract: Stroke is a common fatal and disabling disease in the elderly. We investigated the correlation and potential benefits of dietary intake of flavonoid compounds and their subclasses in elderly stroke patients.
journal: Journal of stroke and cerebrovascular diseases : the official journal of National Stroke Association
